entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
